components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
h2. Problem

The loading property of WebView returns 'undefined' even if the WebView is clearly loading a web page. 
1. It should return false when not loading, not 'undefined'
2. It should return true when the WebView is loading content

h2. Test case

Run this in an interval loop
{code:lang=javascript|title=app.js}
Ti.API.info("Search loading: " + $.searchview.loading);
{code}

h2. Logs

{code:lang=none|title=console}
[INFO] :   Search loading: undefined
[INFO] :   Search loading: undefined
[INFO] :   Search loading: undefined
[INFO] :   Search loading: undefined
[INFO] :   Search loading: undefined
{code}

h2. Discussions
fields.summary: iOS: WebView: loading property returns undefined

comments.body: Closing ticket as duplicate and links to the related ticket has been provided above.
